name: Old Silver Beach
description: A popular beach with warm, shallow waters and stunning views of Buzzards Bay, perfect for families and swimming.

name: Falmouth Heights Beach
description: A lively beach with soft sand and gentle waves, offering beautiful views of Martha's Vineyard and passing ferries.

name: Wood Neck Beach
description: A serene beach with calm waters and a salt marsh, ideal for nature lovers and bird watchers.

name: Surf Drive Beach
description: A long, narrow beach with views of Martha's Vineyard, perfect for jogging, walking, and watching spectacular sunsets.

name: Chapoquoit Beach
description: A less crowded beach with strong waves, popular among surfers and those seeking a more secluded beach experience.

name: Menauhant Beach
description: A family-friendly beach with calm waters and a jetty, offering great views of Vineyard Sound and nearby islands.

name: Bristol Beach
description: A small, quiet beach perfect for locals and visitors seeking a peaceful seaside retreat with views of Buzzards Bay.
